DOC.brief_summary: The objective investigation demonstrate effectiveness safety Biatain Ibu non-adhesive foam dressing compare Biatain non-adhesive foam dressing .
DOC.brief_title: Biatain Ibu vs. Biatain Painful Chronic Venous Leg Ulcers
DOC.criteria: > = 18 year age Chronic venous leg ulcer lower leg Ulcer duration > = 8 week Pain intensity study ulcer least 4 11point numerical box scale ( NBS ) : 0= pain , 10= bad possible pain Exudate level moderate high Ulcer size min 1.6 cm max 11 cm direction Ankle/brachial index > = 0.8 Treated moist wound heal past 2 week prior inclusion Adequate compression therapy past 2 week prior inclusion The patient cognitive capable evaluate his/her pain relief pain intensity The patient able understand treatment willing comply treatment regimen . The patient able complete patient diary The patient willing able give write informed consent Painful ulcer treatment resistant analgesic past 6 month Pregnant lactating woman Known verified hypersensitivity content product use investigation Local infection ( bacterial imbalanced wound ) study ulcer Clinical infection study ulcer Diseases : Vasculitis , erysipelas cellulitis periulcer skin The investigator consider patient eligible Diseases condition ibuprofen analgesic contraindicate ( include know hypersensitivity Aspirin ( acetylsalicylic acid ) analgesic , especially associated history asthma , rhinitis urticaria ) Diabetes Use per need medication past 3 day Concomitant treatment systemic antibiotic nitrofurantoin Concomitant treatment systemic corticosteroid ( 10 mg/day prednisolon equivalent ) immunosuppressant within 1 month prior inclusion Concomitant treatment cancer chemotherapeutics Concomitant participation study Previous participation study
